## PerlinNoise2DNode class

Calculates a perlin noise by input UV and scale value

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class PerlinNoise2DNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns a float value
